alert.note: Alert for Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:04PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Smith, western De Kalb, northeastern Rutherford, southern Wilson and northern Cannon Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Lebanon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Lebanon, Smithville, Woodbury, Smyrna, La Vergne, Watertown, Walterhill, Rural Hill, Alexandria, Dowelltown, Liberty, Auburntown, Lascassas, Tuckers Crossroads, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Milton, Gladeville and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 234 and 249. Interstate 840 between mile markers 57 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cannon; De Kalb; Rutherford; Smith; Wilson
